> <OLD>
>
> Tucson knew time was crutial and he knew that even though he wa=
s not in
the best of condition, he still felt that he had to contribute to =
making an
effort to save the Ark.
>
> "Windlord, Kup, your words are wise, =
and if situations were different, I
would definitely heed them very well. B=
ut situations are grim, and without
my help, we could lose everything we st=
and for. I am not about to let that
happen a second time, my friends. I pro=
mised to protect the Ark when I took
the power of the Matrix. And protect i=
t and everyone I will. It's important
that the Autobots who are in stasis n=
ow, are preserved until it's their time
to awaken. Especially, Optimus Prim=
e. We can not let anything happen to him,
and at the same time, I can not l=
et anything happen to all of you."
>
> He forces himself to accelerate yet =
it proves difficult, in his present
condition.

> Windlord lookign at Tusco=
n said "You and Talon arnet in the best shape,
> lad, you should cover till=
 all ended" Kup looked at Tucson and nodded

<NEW>

=93It=92s important tha=
t ALL of them stay whole and healthy.=94 Torca said as he
walked in front o=
f Tuscon. =93If any of them, including the Decepticons should
be damaged, i=
t would change the future.=94

Bantor nodded, =93Remember, as deranged as M=
egatron was, at least he kept the
Decepticons as one unit, they were easier=
 to fight.=94

=93And keep in mind, it was Megatron that kept the Deceptico=
ns so focused on
the defeat of Optimus Prime.=94 Torca said grimly, =93Ther=
e were others in the
Decepticon army who would have focused more on the hum=
ans or just the
destruction of the Earth.=94

Bantor looked at Torca, =93It=
 almost sounds like you admired Megatron.=94

=93No.=94 Torca said, his dee=
p reverberour voice intonming with a deep finality.
=93I am only saying tha=
t if you were to slay even the Decepticons, the fate of
the Autobots would =
not be what it is now, and that some of us, if not all of
us may not even b=
e alive.=94

As they talked the familiar outline of the Ark could be seen i=
n the
distance, they were almost there.

(OOC: You'll be there next post)

=
> <OLD>
>
> While watching Quickstride, Uproar catches a curious scent in t=
he Ark. He
finds it to be feline, and familliar. He can also smell the scen=
t of the
intruder. He narrows his eyes.
>
> "Guys, I think I'm picking up o=
n Elita's scent, it's faint, but it's
there, and there's another scent I'm =
not familliar with... Definitely not
one of us that's for sure.." I - think=
 Elita's in danger."
>
> Quickstride looks down to him.
>
> "Well, that's n=
ot at all impossible because I'm getting a blip on my wrist
radar.. Yeah, y=
ou're right, there is an intruder here, and two blips, one
familliar, Maxim=
al like us, and one that's reading unfamilliar, could be
pred or con, or ev=
en Minion... Hard ta tell.."
>
> Uproar growls.
>
> If that intruder puts o=
ne scratch on Elita.... Leo ll, please, ya gotta
lemme go! I think I know w=
here Elita is and I definitely know there's a
dangerous intruder not far fr=
om her! I just dunno who or what it is."
>
> Pacing in a very tense circle,=
 he waits to get permission to follow the
scent and the signal.

<NEW>

As =
Uproar paced a female computer voice said, =93One minute remaining until
de=
tonation.=94 The counter on the front panel mirrored that count as it
conti=
nued to count down towards zero.

Leo II looked up at Quickstride, =93I wou=
ld suggest that you and Wing Caliber
get to work on diffusing the bomb whil=
e Uproar and I will work on tracking
the scent.=94 Leo II=92s face was ston=
e serious as he looked around, =93We don=92t
have much time left for talk.=
=94

Wing Caliber nodded as he caught Leo=92s mood, it was none to good. He=
 was not
as hot headed as Tuscon perhaps, but when the chips were down, he =
wanted
action and not words.

Wing Caliber had been pulling up a schematic =
as the others had talked,
=93Quickstride, get some tools and prepare to ope=
n the cover of the device. I
will talk you through it.=94

As Wing Caliber =
worked with Quickstride Leo turned to look at Uproar,
=93You=92re with me.=
=94 He said his voice full of command and authority. If Tuscon
was built in=
 the image of Optimus Prime, Leo was built every inch in the
image of Leo, =
or even Leo Prime, another Autobot leader and commander, and
it was obvious=
 that he was not going to let things fall apart on his watch.

(OOC: Yes, L=
eo Prime is an Actual Maximal leader. Feel free to look him up)

Leo pointe=
d his weapon at the door that had been blown shut. =93On my mark
fire your =
best weapon at the door, we are going to open it, NOW!=94

=93MARK!=94 Leo =
fires his plasma cannon at the door!

> <OLD>
>
> Perceptor said with cold =
tone "Well, i hope that your old habits dont
> include shoot the allies... =
cause I'll shoot back. Nightlight is out of
> danger, as long as the intrud=
er doesnt storm inside the Medical bay"and
> added with a gloomy tone"We ne=
ed to find the kid... If Razorsharp find her
> first, i dont want to tell w=
hat he will be able to do her but also we need
> to protect the bots contai=
ned in the Ark... What do you bet that Hydras
> wouldnt be happy to know th=
is little intrusion???? We need set priorities"

<NEW>

Rodimus nodded, =93=
It will take a moment to get used to all of these changes.=94
Rodimus said =
as he glanced back at Perceptor. =93But I am glad you were here
to care for=
 Nightlight, that means a lot to me.=94

At Perceptor=92s mention of =91the=
 kid=92 Rodimus nodded, =93This is almost over.=94
Rodimus=92 optics widene=
d, =93Didn=92t someone tell me Blackrazor could teleport?=94
Rodius=92 opti=
cs now narrowed thoughtfully, =93If he could, why is he still
here?=94


Me=
anwhile with Elita . . .

> <OLD>
>
> Elita poped out her hide out in her m=
ine sabletooth cub's form and said
> "KEy???? what Key???? I dont have any =
key... Beside why have I to Follow
> you???? You're a decepticon and an ext=
ranger..."

<NEW>

=93I am MORE than a Decepticon.=94 Blackrazor said in a =
harsh whisper. =93And you
will come with me now!=94 he said as he oriented =
his weapons blast on Elita,
his optics narrowing . . .

> <OLD>
>
> Hydras =
opened his comlink and said "Tell me when you are REady... and I
> FORBID Y=
OU HARM ANY DECEPTICON INSIDE THE ARK, with the exception of that
> Treache=
rous Mole-rat... If you have touched them then I personally kill
> you...."=


<NEW>

=93Of course Hydras.=94 Blackrazor answered back. =93I won=92t tou=
ch a single
Decepticon.=94

With an evil smiled he fired at Elita a stunnin=
g blast, one not designed to
kill, but mearly to knock unconscious.

Meanwh=
ile outside Hydras could see a large group of Maximals and Autobots
making =
their way back towards the Ark. So far the sweeps around him were
keeping h=
im off the radar, but soon the Maximals would be close enough for
them to s=
ee him.

Also he could easily see three Maximals flying around the Ark. Alt=
hough they
could not get past the shield, it would make it difficult for hi=
m to get in
undetected if he chose to try it.

(TAG)

Preston

is now, are preserved until it's their time to awaken. Especially, Opti=
mus Prime. We can not let anything happen to him, and at the same time, I c=
